fields.name: Huile 72%
fields.description: A luxurious soap containing 72% premium oils, offering deep moisturizing and nourishment for your skin.
fields.ingredients: Olive oil, coconut oil, palm oil, shea butter, water, sodium hydroxide.

fields.name: Calendula
fields.description: Our Calendula Soap is perfect for sensitive skin, enriched with the soothing and healing properties of calendula flowers.
fields.ingredients: Olive oil, coconut oil, palm oil, calendula extract, calendula petals, water, sodium hydroxide.

fields.name: Coffee

fields.name: 24 Piece Deluxe Set
